input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command via command line
Enter the desired free space setting for the volume to the specified percentage (for example
Enter the minimum size in kilobytes (KB) for files to be managed. Only files larger than the specified size will be managed.
Specifies an inclusion rule to be added to the volume
Specifies an exclusion rule to be added to the volume
This option should be used only with "include rule" or "exclude rule". Valid value: true

output.description: XML document consisting of one or more <line> elements that contain the command response. Each <line> element contains an index attribute indicating the order in which the information was returned by the command.
Did the operation succeed? Valid values: true

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fat-command> <command os-id="Linux"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on Linux.</xsl:text> </command> <command os-id="SunOS"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on SunOS.</xsl:text> </command> <command os-id="Windows Default"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">rss volume manage </xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${volume name}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[volume name] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${desired free space}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/dfs:$[desired free space] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${size lower limit}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/size:$[lower limit size] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${days not accessed}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/access:$[days not accessed] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${include rule}') !=0 and string-length('${exclude rule}') =0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/include:$[include rule] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${exclude rule}') !=0 and string-length('${include rule}') =0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/exclude:$[exclude rule] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${include rule}') !=0 and '${recursive}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/recursive </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${exclude rule}') !=0 and '${recursive}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/recursive </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="Windows XP"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on Windows XP.</xsl:text> </command> </fat-command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Perform RSS Manage Volume Manage an RSS volume.
